General.Name: First Copper Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: First Copper Technology Co., Ltd. produces and sells copper and copper alloy strips in Taiwan and internationally. The company's products primarily include brass, phosphor bronze, copper, and nickel silver; copper alloys for lead frame; tin-plated copper alloys; and special copper alloys for high performance terminals, etc. It supplies products to various industries, such as electronic, semi-conductive, etc. The company was formerly known as First Copper & Iron Co., Ltd. First Copper Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Kaohsiung City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 170, Chung Cheng 4th Rd., Kaohsiung, Taiwan
